title: FontArk is getting better
content:
Hi

[FontArk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420032411/http:/fontark.net/)'s full real-time glyphs synchronization system has been developed quite a lot since it's introduction at Sep.2013.

Read about the latest improvements [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420032411/http:/fontark.net/farkwp/new-outline-modes-icon-mode-and-more/). (Watching the outline-modes video clip is recommended)

Feedback is warmly appreciated.
author: Equilibs
